biotools.summary: Tool to search a knowledge base of the most commonly used chromatographic columns to locate those with the properties best-suited to the separation at hand. The Column Selector database contains information for 254 characterized columns, along with results for >4800 systematic experiments.

bioschemas.name: ACD
